title: You Can Go
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 33 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: The story You Can Go follows a puppy on an outdoor adventure. Supportive pictures highlight position-word vocabulary used in the story. High-frequency words and the repetitive text pattern make this book perfect for beginning readers.
meta: across, around, backward, forward, over, through
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Short Vowels : Discriminate the initial short /u/ vowel sound
Short Vowels : Associate the letter Uu with the short /u/ vowel sound
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of periods
Position Words : Recognize and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
